clientHandler.cannotDisableAllAuthProvidersDescription: It is not possible to disable or delete last enabled provider.

enterprise.sidebarTooltip: Your account has access to the enterprise features globally
enterprise.licenseDescription: Viewers are free with Baserow Enterprise. If a user has any other role, in any workspace then they will use a paid seat automatically.
enterprise.overflowWarning: You have too many non-viewer users and have used up all of your paid seats. Change users to become viewers on each workspaces members page.

createTeamModal.title: Create team
createTeamModal.invalidNameMessage: This team name is already in use in the specified workspace.

updateTeamModal.title: Update {teamName}
updateTeamModal.invalidNameMessage: This team name is already in use in the specified workspace.

manageTeamModals.subheading: Teams allow you to give or restrict permissions in bulk to multiple people.

manageTeamForm.noSubjectsSelected: Click '{buttonLabel}' to optionally add team users.
manageTeamForm.roleHelpText: User specific roles will always override Team roles.

teamsTable.title: {teamCount} teams in {workspaceName}
teamsTable.roleHelpText: Can be overriden with roles on databases and tables.

auditLogExportModal.title: Export to CSV
auditLogExportModal.cancelledDescription: Something went wrong while exporting the audit log. Please try again.

samlSettingsForm.domainAlreadyExists: A SAML provider for this domain already exists
samlSettingsForm.invalidMetadata: Invalid XML metadata for the Identity Provider

deleteAuthProviderModal.title: Delete {name}
deleteAuthProviderModal.comment: Do you really want to delete this {type}?

loginWithSaml.continueWithSaml: Continue to the SAML SSO provider
loginWithSaml.requestError: This domain is not configured with SAML SSO

loginError.title: Something went wrong:
loginError.help: Please contact your administrator for help.
loginError.defaultErrorMessage: it was not possible to complete the SSO login flow.
loginError.errorSsoFeatureNotActive: SSO feature is not active. Please contact your administrator.
loginError.errorProviderDoesNotExist: this authentication provider doesn't exist or is not available.
loginError.errorAuthFlowError: an error occurred during the authentication flow with the selected provider.
loginError.errorDifferentProvider: please use the provider that you originally signed up with.
loginError.errorWorkspaceInvitationEmailMismatch: your email address does not match with the invitation.
loginError.errorSignupDisabled: sign up has been disabled by the administrator.

admin.name: Admin
admin.description: Can fully configure and edit workspaces and applications.

builder.name: Builder
builder.description: Can fully configure and edit applications.

editor.name: Editor
editor.description: Can fully edit data but not configure applications or workspaces.

commenter.name: Commenter
commenter.description: Can only read and comment on data.

noRoleLowPriority.name: No role
noRoleLowPriority.description: Get default workspace role from their teams.

error.title: Could not fetch data
error.description: An error occurred while fetching the member data.

database.title: {name} database
database.everyoneHasAccess: Everyone at {name} workspace can access this database.
database.onlyYouHaveAccess: Only you can access this database.
database.warningMessage: Other users might inherit access via their respective roles on the parent workspace.
database.headerTooltip: Database roles will override workspace roles.

table.title: {name} table
table.everyoneHasAccess: Everyone at {name} workspace can access this table.
table.onlyYouHaveAccess: Only you can access this table.
table.warningMessage: Other users might inherit access via their respective roles on the parent database or workspace.
table.headerTooltip: Table roles will override workspace and database roles.

memberRolesMembersList.adminHelpText: Admins can restrict other admins roles.
memberRolesMembersList.noMembers: No members have been selected. Use the select button to add one.

selectSubjectsListFooter.helpTooltip: Member role assignments override team role assignments.

membersRoleField.noAccessHelpText: This user requires explicit access to resources.
membersRoleField.adminHelpText: Admins can restrict other admins roles.

membersPagePlugin.roleHelpText: Can be overriden with roles on databases and tables.

oauthSettingsForm.invalidBaseUrl: The entered URL is not a valid provider URL

snapshotModalWarning.message: Please be aware that a snapshot will include any permissions set on the application and its tables.

localBaserowUserSourceForm.description: Every row in the table is a user account. Please select the matching fields in the table. The email field will be used to identify.
